com.snakesAndLadders.game

Class Gamefield

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakesAndLadders.game.Gamefield

  • public class Gamefield
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gamefield(int size, QuestionList questionList, int[] questionFieldList, int[][] jumpFieldList)
      Create a new Gamefield with the details of size, questionlist for questionfields and jumpfields For an example the data for the default field are in the class GamefieldDetail.java The fields coud be type of Field.java (normalfield) or Jumpfield.java or Questionfield.java
